Articles.Content:
Can someone tell me why this is happening?

 

Never mind, I went off an did another contract and when I came back this one had completed. Weird.

Edited March 13, 2016 by uglyduckling81

2 hours ago, uglyduckling81 said:

Never mind, I went off an did another contract and when I came back this one had completed. Weird.

Yeah, there's a lot of strange things with contracts. Most of the time when something doesn't complete, but should, the first things to try are either a quick save/quick load or go to the space center and go back to the ship. Usually one of those two things will kick the contract into completing.

2 hours ago, FullMetalMachinist said:

Yeah, there's a lot of strange things with contracts. Most of the time when something doesn't complete, but should, the first things to try are either a quick save/quick load or go to the space center and go back to the ship. Usually one of those two things will kick the contract into completing. 

Yeah, I've been fighting with this one now. Quite annoying. The weird thing about this one was I decided to push the Peri up a little to see if it made any difference and it went from green to not finished, effectively got worse.

12 minutes ago, uglyduckling81 said:

Yeah, I've been fighting with this one now. Quite annoying. The weird thing about this one was I decided to push the Peri up a little to see if it made any difference and it went from green to not finished, effectively got worse.

Hmmm... Yes, that is very strange. Unfortunately I don't have any advise other than what I already said, and maybe even closing and restarting the game. 

Beyond that I'm afraid I don't really have the knowledge to be of more help. But if you post the things requested in this thread (list of mods, machine specs, output file, etc.) then you'll hopefully get help from someone more knowledgeable. 

One last thing. If you're sure that you've done what the contract wants, and you don't want to spend a whole bunch of time tracking down the issue, you can always use the Alt-F12 debug menu to force the contract to complete. 

Sorry I can't be of more help.
